ratings.comment: All MATH535 lecture material comes from an online textbook written by Dr. Roch himself. Attendance is measured using TopHat (full credit for attending at least half the classes). He's a pretty good lecturer, focusing on the most important topics and leaving time for questions. If you attend class, scoring well on the exams isn't too hard.
I don't understand these reviews, Sebastien is amazing at teaching. He has a deep understanding of the material, gives easy exams, helpful outside of class.

A great way instructing things and letting student know Math is not the thing. Super "rigorous" and quite confusing, and so could possibly make the topic complicated to a level that is not appropriate for this level of class.
He is not good at teaching but he is very willing to help and his lecture notes are very good for self-learning. So it's okay to take class with him if you are a good self-learner.

I don't know what Prof. Roch is talking about, he can introduce a hundred theorems with little to no explanations,    let alone give examples. HW is also challenging, you should take care yourself and learn by yourself.

Math 632 is a hard course as it. Although Roch taught the class clearly he sometimes went fast. The lectures are proof heavy while the homeworks and tests are not. There are no solutions to homeoworks posted except for the quiz questions based on the homeowork. The exams are intended to be very difficult and require you to think beyond homework.

Great professor for this course.  Explained things very intuitively, and left lots of time for review for exams.  Unfortunately, during a 50 minute section, exams were extremely tough for lack of time. HWs aren't too frequent, maybe 7 or 8 total all semester.  Super interesting class.

Probability is a very interested subject. Prof. Roch made it the most confusing. I wont be surprised if none of the people from this class end up doing their PhD research related to probability theory. If he is a good researcher he should just be doing that.
Great example of an arrogant professor.  Avoid at all costs. Teaches to the book but exams are nothing related to any examples given.

I have never had a worse professor/teacher in my entire life. Incredibly rude, even less helpful, and made this class way harder than it needed to be. His practice exams have nothing to do with tests. Avoid taking him at all costs

Avoid this prof- He is super unfriendly and is an awful teacher. He says you will be fine if you do homework and review problems, but the exams are impossible to do well on. He refuses to answer questions right before an exam, and is very rude about it. All he does is teach examples out of the book, so it was a waste even attending lecture.

He made this class much more difficult than was necessary.  He goes through problems way too quickly, and expects you to know more than you do.  The exams were ridiculously hard, almost impossible.  Take this class with another professor if you can
